price: "Não há senão nossa primeira morte, e não seremos ressuscitados
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
